response.original_title: The Deciders: Red, Whiteville, And Blue
response.overview: Working-class residents in a small, Southern town get a strange offer from a group of self-professed Patriotic Millionaires: we’ll show you how politicians from both parties rigged the economy against you, if you’ll help us fix it?  Dubbing themselves “The Deciders,” this nascent group of single mothers, military veterans and Trump supporters finds solidarity in pursuit of a living wage and faces entrenched forces and callous political leaders in a heartfelt documentary that will leave you asking who really decides where the money goes?  And why not you?
response.tagline: A small, Southern town. A few rogue millionaires.  And the race to save America from itself.
response.title: The Deciders: Red, Whiteville, And Blue
